item.title: Quick Start
item.description: The following sections describe how to build and run Cloud Hypervisor. Prerequisites for AArch64 # AArch64 servers (recommended) or development boards equipped with the GICv3 interrupt controller. Host OS # For required KVM functionality the minimum host kernel version is 4.11. For adequate performance the minimum recommended host kernel version is 5.6. The majority of the CI currently tests with kernel version 5.15. Use Pre-built Binaries # The recommended approach to getting started with Cloud Hypervisor is by using a pre-built binary.
